title: Bluetooth passive sensor API changes for 2022.9
description: For Home Assistant Core 2022.9 we have changed the PassiveBluetoothProcessorCoordinator and PassiveBluetoothDataProcessor bluetooth API's to make PassiveBluetoothProcessorCoordinator responsible for parsing. The coordinator then pushes parsed data to PassiveBluetoothDataProcessor instances.

frontMatter.author: John Carr
